cookies.meta_desc: Information about the use of cookies on the Pena da Osa website. Transparency and privacy.
cookies.title: Cookie policy
cookies.subtitle: Only own and necessary cookies to remember your choice of the banner.
cookies.what_are_cookies_desc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are used to make the website work more efficiently and to provide information to the site owners.
cookies.what_we_use_desc: At Pena da Osa we only use cookies strictly necessary for the basic operation of the website:
cookies.pref_cookies_desc: We remember your choice about the cookie banner so as not to show it to you again.
cookies.session_cookies_desc: They allow basic navigation through the website.
cookies.no_third_party: We do not use third-party cookies
cookies.no_third_party_desc: We do not use analytical, advertising or social network cookies. We do not share information with third parties through cookies.
cookies.manage_cookies_desc: You can manage or delete cookies according to your preferences. For more information, consult your browser's help:
cookies.banner_text: We use our own cookies to improve your browsing experience. By continuing, you accept our

the_house.hero_subtitle: A meticulously restored traditional stone construction that combines the soul of rural Galicia with modern luxury.
the_house.intro_p1: Pena da Osa is not just an accommodation; it is a testimony to traditional Galician architecture. Its granite walls hold centuries of history, now renovated to offer a haven of peace.
the_house.intro_p2: With its 3 floors and spaces designed for living together, it is the ideal place for large families or groups of friends looking to disconnect without giving up the comfort of a luxury hotel.
the_house.dist_subtitle: More than 400m¬≤ dedicated to your relaxation
the_house.ground_floor_desc: The heart of the traditional Galician house
the_house.ground_f1: Traditional patio with a cozy atmosphere
the_house.ground_f2: Barbecue area with an old stone oven
the_house.first_f1: Fully equipped kitchen with a terrace
the_house.first_f2: Spacious and bright main living room
the_house.amenities_subtitle: No detail is missing to make your stay perfect, from entertainment to relaxation.
the_house.amenity_kitchen_desc: Cast iron stove for authentic experiences
the_house.amenity_rooms_desc: Capacity for groups of up to 12-14 people
the_house.amenity_baths_desc: Maximum privacy: almost all with private bathroom
the_house.amenity_equipped_desc: Everything you need for large banquets
the_house.cta_ready: Ready to visit with your loved ones?
the_house.cta_p: Book the complete house exclusively for your group.
the_house.alt_exterior_stone: Traditional stone exterior of Pe√±a da Osa

environment.title: Environment - Pena da Osa | Ribeira Sacra, Sil Canyons
environment.description: Discover the surroundings of Pena da Osa in Sober: Sil Canyons, Ribeira Sacra wineries, Romanesque monasteries and hiking trails. 500m from the center.
environment.hero_subtitle: Located in the heart of the Ribeira Sacra, 500 meters from the center of Sober and close to the spectacular Sil Canyons.
environment.heroic_vineyards: The heroic vineyards of the Ribeira Sacra
environment.visit_sober_subtitle: A destination full of nature, culture and winemaking tradition
environment.attraction_sil_desc: Impressive river gorges with spectacular viewpoints and hiking trails. A few minutes from the house.
environment.attraction_wineries_desc: Visit the wineries of the oldest designation of origin in Galicia. Tastings and tours available.
environment.attraction_monasteries_desc: Discover the religious heritage of the Ribeira Sacra, with centuries-old monasteries of great beauty.
environment.attraction_hiking_desc: Explore the trails that run through terraced vineyards and unique landscapes of the area.
environment.attraction_viewpoints_desc: Unforgettable views from the viewpoints of the Sil Canyons and the Mi√±o River.
environment.attraction_sober_desc: Just 500 meters away, enjoy the charm of the village with its traditional shops and restaurants.
environment.sil_p1: The Sil Canyons are one of the most spectacular landscapes in Galicia. These deep gorges carved by the Sil River offer impressive views from multiple viewpoints.
environment.sil_p2: You can take catamarans along the river, hike through the viewpoints, or simply enjoy the tranquility and beauty of the natural environment.
environment.sil_p3: The canyon walls are covered with terraced vineyards, creating a unique landscape that combines nature and winemaking tradition.
environment.wineries_p: The Ribeira Sacra Designation of Origin is known for its unique wines, grown in heroic vineyards that defy gravity on the slopes of the canyons. Sober is one of the main centers of this wine region.
environment.wineries_tastings_p: Discover the wine-making process and taste the region's best wines in nearby wineries.
environment.wineries_heroic_p: Vineyards on steep slopes are a unique sight, worked with traditional techniques passed down through generations.
environment.wineries_varieties_p: Menc√≠a, Godello, Albari√±o... Discover the unique grape varieties that give character to the wines of Ribeira Sacra.
environment.location_subtitle: Pena da Osa is strategically located so you can enjoy all the attractions of the Ribeira Sacra
environment.alt_vineyards: Terraced vineyard landscape of the Ribeira Sacra
environment.alt_sil_canyons: Panoramic view of the Sil Canyons with vineyards

gallery.title: Gallery - Pena da Osa | Photo Tour
gallery.description: Explore the photo gallery of Pena da Osa. See our rooms, kitchen, patio, BBQ area and the stunning surroundings.
gallery.hero_subtitle: Interior, exterior and surroundings. A faithful look so you know exactly what you are going to experience.

contact.title: Contact - Pena da Osa | Book your Stay in Galicia
contact.description: Contact Pena da Osa in Sober, Lugo. Call +34 639 403 998 or visit us in the heart of the Ribeira Sacra.
contact.hero_subtitle: Write to us for questions, availability or local recommendations.
contact.copy_error_desc: Your browser does not allow automatic copying.
contact.tip_text: For bookings, you can also use the online system integrated into the web.
